title: Tassel, late 17th century
medium: Medium: silk, metal thread on linen core, linen
description: Over a linen core, a skirt of red silk partly covered by a trellis of silver thread and topped with a galloon (probably a later addition). Cord of knotted pink and green silk and silver thread with a knob of galloon (later addition).

tombstone.epitaph: Tassel, late 17th century. Medium: silk, metal thread on linen core, linen. 1908-2-6.
